original_text: So Moses lifted up his hand over the sea. At dawn, the sea returned to its proper place. The Egyptians tried to run away from the water, but the Lord made them drown in the middle of the sea.
korean_text: 모세가 곧 손을 바다 위로 내밀매 새벽이 되어 바다의 힘이 회복된지라 애굽 사람들이 물을 거슬러 도망하나 여호와께서 애굽 사람들을 바다 가운데 엎으시니

sentences.original_text: So Moses lifted up his hand over the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세가 바다 위에 손을 들었다

sentences.original_text: the sea returned to its proper place
The Egyptians tried to run away from the water
but the Lord made them drown
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주님께서 그들이 물에 빠져 죽게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: in the middle of the sea
